TEXT.TITLE: MERRILL LYNCH U.K. EXECUTIVE CHARGED BY SEC
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said it charged a managing director of Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner and Smith Ltd in London with masterminding "a massive insider trading scheme." Nahum Vaskevitch, managing director of the Mergers and Acquisitions Department of the broker's London office, was charged in a civil complaint by the SEC filed in Manhattan Federal Court. The complaint said Vaskevitch leaked information about 12 companies involved in a merger or acquisition which resulted in more than four mln dlrs in profit for himself and others involved in the scheme. Merrill Lynch, Pierce, Fenner and Smith is a subsidiary of Merrill Lynch and Co Inc. Reuter
